The Super Bowl is such a massive event that Fox Sports was able to use its abundance of cameras at NRG Stadium to break down the mystery of Tom Brady's jersey. 
According to multiple reports on Monday , Brady's Super Bowl 51 jersey was allegedly stolen by the former director of Mexico-based tabloid La Prensa , Mauricio Ortega. 
During Tuesday's The Herd with Colin Cowherd , Fox Sports' Jay Glazer joined the show and reviewed video from the field and Patriots locker room. They were able to locate a reporter who they identified as Ortega and detailed as he entered the locker room before the permitted postgame availability. 
Glazer described the scene from the moment Brady handed off his jersey to a team staffer, to when Ortega evidently entered the locker room and left with the jersey between his arm. 
According to USA TODAY , Brady's missing jersey was valued around $500,000.
